Uses of Class
org.apache.commons.imaging.palette.Palette

Packages that use Palette
org.apache.commons.imaging.palette Color quantization and palette manipulation tools. 
 

Uses of Palette in org.apache.commons.imaging.palette
 

Subclasses of Palette in org.apache.commons.imaging.palette
 class QuantizedPalette
           
 class SimplePalette
           
 

Methods in org.apache.commons.imaging.palette that return Palette
 Palette PaletteFactory.makeExactRgbPaletteFancy(BufferedImage src)
          Builds an exact complete opaque palette containing all the colors in src, using an algorithm that is faster than PaletteFactory.makeExactRgbPaletteSimple(java.awt.image.BufferedImage, int) for large images but uses 2 mebibytes of working memory.
 Palette PaletteFactory.makeQuantizedRgbaPalette(BufferedImage src, boolean transparent, int max)
          Builds an inexact possibly translucent palette of at most max colors in src using the traditional Median Cut algorithm.
 Palette PaletteFactory.makeQuantizedRgbPalette(BufferedImage src, int max)
          Builds an inexact opaque palette of at most max colors in src using a variation of the Median Cut algorithm.
 Palette MedianCutQuantizer.process(BufferedImage image, int max_colors, MedianCutImplementation medianCutImplementation, boolean verbose)
           
 

Methods in org.apache.commons.imaging.palette with parameters of type Palette
static void Dithering.applyFloydSteinbergDithering(BufferedImage image, Palette palette)
